channel.title: Question about pitch bend
channel.description:
Quick question: How do I make a patch that can receive pitch bend? I have some that will bend and others that will not and I cannot figure out the device(s) that enable the bend. I am actually planning to use it on the linnstrument but I am asking for both regular patches and MPE ones as well.
Big thanks to the axo community!

item.title: Question about pitch bend
item.dc:creator: @janvantomme Jan Vantomme
item.description:
@janvantomme wrote:

You'll need a keyboard and a pitch bend object. Best is to feed the pitch bend through a math/*c object before adding it to the note signal of the keyboard. Setting the math/*c object to 12.00 will give you a full octave bend below and above the played note. This will work with a regular keyboard. Can't give you advice on MPE since I don't own a device.
